Question.Subject: Mozilla Firefox 3 bookmarks backup?
Question.Content: IE has a folder that keep our Favorite site's address files.But does Mozilla have something like it?How can I make a backup of my bookmarks of Mozilla?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Go to Bookmark -> Organize Bookmark or press this (Ctrl+Shift+B) Then library will appear, go to Import and backup tab and choose backup.. that bakcup file will name like this ( .JSON )

Answer.Content: Go to Bookmark -> Organize Bookmark or press this (Ctrl+Shift+B) Then library will appear, go to Import and backup tab and choose backup.. that bakcup file will name like this ( .JSON )
